turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! I need some coffee. Can you order some from Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm at Perry Park in Phoenix.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh good, you are just a couple blocks away. There is one at N 32nd St and Thomas Rd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are there any landmarks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Look for El Jacal Mexican Restuarant. What will you have today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Isn't there some sort of cold macchiato? Do they have one with caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is an "Iced Caramel Cloud Macchiato."

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That should do the trick.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Better make it a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With extra caramel?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know me too well!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you heading over there now or should I place the order for later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll walk that way in about 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll tell them you need it in 10. Should I put a tip on your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I've got some cash on me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. The order is placed and will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
